name: Gifts in April
description:
As Soo-Jin, explore your village, trade with your neighbors, and craft gifts with which to win your love's affections. Choose between Jun, an upbeat soldier who always treasures your time together, and Eun-Yeong, a noble lady longing for an unattainable future. Spend your time and resources wisely - you only have so many chances to woo them.

Three potential endings.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD/arrow keys
  • Interact - E
  • Inventory - tab
  • Crafting - click on two valid items in your inventory
  • Quit - escape

Credits:

  • Al Sumstad
    • art (character + UI), level design, dialogue, crafting recipes
  • Hari Jeung
    • art (environment + crafting items), level design, dialogue
  • Olivia Elmers
    • scripting, dialogue

Sounds from Freesound and Orange Free Sounds. Music from Rooftop Prince. Font is Philosopher.
